DOC.brief_summary: The present study part project title 'Magnesium asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ' . The hypothesis main project daily magnesium supplement benefit patient asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease . The aim part project study pharmacokinetics follow two magnesium supplement : - Mablet ( dietary supplement ) - Magnesium Sulfate ( solution infusion )
DOC.brief_title: Study Metabolism Two Magnesium Supplements Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer . Smokers , Using pharmaceuticals/supplements , Vegans/vegetarians , Major change eat habit within one week prior study start .
